markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mystery Conduit](/Feats.aspx?ID=6086) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cursebound" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=800" />
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=817" />
<trait label="Spellshape" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=513" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 143 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

The power of your mystery enables you access to myriad magic. If your next action is to [Cast a Spell](/Actions.aspx?ID=2734) of 5th rank or lower that has no duration, you do not expend a spell slot.
name: Mystery Conduit
